PI: footnote The purpose is to produce footnotes. It is based on the existence of span-tags with class="fn" in the content of the module where this PI is encountered. The parameters are: form (optional) Possible values ar: normal: normal footnote strategy, this is default show: the footnote text will be integrated in the running text, enclosed i paranthesis. No footnotes remove: the footnotes will be removed from the text. No footnotes Styleclass(es) describing this PI is: wxtfnmarker,fn and wxtfootnote. See distributed std styles. Examples: This: Halden is situated about 100km south of OsloOslo is the capital of Norway. ...
will produce this: Halden is situated about 100km south of Oslo 1 Oslo is the capital of Norway ...
  1. Oslo is the capital of Norway
